extendedInfo.description: *This app is now free because it may not work on your newer Android device. No update will be released.* Thank youHave you ever been at work, in class, or on the go, unable to answer phone calls or text messages? Introducing Automated Away Text Messaging, the most convenient application for the Google Android. At last there is a new and easy way of letting family, friends, or coworkers know where you are when you are unable to answer phone calls or text messages. When activated, this unique application sends an automatic and customizable text message to those who call or text you. The application is the right choice for all Android phones and OS versions. Peace of mind for you and your contacts is now free.   * Developed and tested by a team of professionals.* Great reviews by TheDroidGuy.com (Largest independent Android following & one of the top 3 Android influencers in the world on Twitter), TheDroidDemos.com, Canadiandroid.com, Androidfrontier.com, Androidguys.com and others! Check out Facebook.com/AutoAwayText for these links!* Create and save up to five Automated Away Text Messages: Have a general message for when you are working, in class, driving, or a specific message for your special contacts which only they would receive!* You can have an Automated Away Text Message sent out only in instances of missed calls or received text messages, or both!* Don't want an Automated Away Text Message being sent to your boss, parents, or an unknown number? With Automated Away Text Messaging you can simply choose who does and who does not receive your text message. You also have the ability to send an Automated Away Text Message to only specific contacts.* Not on an unlimited text plan? No problem. Easily set the application to send only one Automated Away Text Message to each caller or texter.* Rotation support for all screens.* Cleanly minimizes into your notification bar when you are Away. ____________________________________________________THOSE WITH HANDCENT SMS OR OTHER AFTERMARKET SMS APPS: Stock/Built-in SMS notifications should be turned on. This inconvenience will be fixed in an update coming shortly!Those with GoogleVoice: As of right now my app will only send your away text if somebody tries to contact you via your real phone number, not your GoogleVoice number.

reviews.title: Do not buy!! REPEAT
reviews.comment: Does not work..   The email for the developer is NOT WORKING & he doesn\'t respond to tweets.    It HASN\'T. sent out one automatic message at all. I hate I wasted my $. Don\'t U do the same.
reviews.author: Issac Cox

reviews.comment: Very well thought out, put together and polished. Terrific response and attitude from the developer. You can\'t go wrong with this one.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great function...fabulous support!
reviews.comment: Truly a fabulous app for anyone with a busy schedule and the need to focus on the task at hand yet let people know you are \"on the ball\" and paying attention to them. Great for client retention!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great interface. The best of the away text apps free or paid
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: The UI is eye candy, the customization are detailed. This App is worth the purchase. Kudos
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Amazing app that works reliably. The developer responds to emails almost instantaneously, is super nice and receptive. Highly recommended app & dev.!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: So awesome just what I needed for work, gym, yard work, just time away, perfect !!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Really great app for when your at work or school! Recommend this 100%
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I loved @ first, but I later found it was not sending out replies consistently.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great app and great customer support! Perhaps the best app I have purchased. Well worth the .99 cents. Thanks again Mitch
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This app is just perfect. Its a must have for ANYONE and by far the best away app out there. It\'s flawless.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: So far great app. I haven\'t encountered any issues yet.. Many other away message or automated texting have issues. Definitely worth paying a dollar.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This is a great application. I suggest it to everyone! I\'m a business person and have several meetings and use this app quiet frequently. 5 Stars !
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Best auto reply out there for SMS and calls! Lets you specify all contacts or certain ones. Dev is quick to respond and help! Worth every penny! EVO
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: +1\'d the app
reviews.comment: Just +1\'d the app, been loving this app for months. The DEV is great with responding. Love the app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bad app
reviews.comment: HTC DNA, ya app dont work wast of money. Dont buy
reviews.author: Pauline Gray

reviews.title: automated away text
reviews.comment: great app.use it all the time on my G2X.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great application! What would make it even better would be the ability to automatically schedule an end time in case you forget to turn it off.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Update please!
reviews.comment: This is pretty much useless to me without support for Handcent and it\'s a pain to have two notifications when I get a single text. I\'ve been waiting on the update for far too long
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great app, was exactly what I needed.
reviews.author: A Google User
